titles.title: A resolution commemorating the life of Luis Alejandro "Alex" Villamayor and calling for justice and accountability.
A resolution commemorating the life of Luis Alejandro "Alex" Villamayor and calling for justice and accountability.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

bill.summary: This resolution (1) commemorates the life of U.S. citizen Luis Alejandro Villamayor, (2) urges Paraguayan authorities to invite the Federal Bureau of Investigation to provide technical assistance to investigate his death, and (3) calls upon the Department of State to prioritize justice for Villamayor in its diplomatic engagement with the Paraguayan government.
